messages.subject: Re: Tampa & Intro
messages.msgSnippet: OK, I should make this quick...It s after midnight and I m exhausted and have to be up early.  Here goes: I m Angela, mom to Abby-5; Mitchell-3; Noah-6months
messages.messageBody:
OK, I should make this quick...It's after midnight and I'm exhausted
and have to be up early. Here goes:
I'm Angela, mom to Abby-5; Mitchell-3; Noah-6months (wife to
Gary). We live in Tampa, FL. I've been interested in hs'ing for
about 3 years...started out thinking that we'd have cute little desks
and bulletin boards. Wow! Have my ideas evolved...I really like
unschooling and Charlotte Mason, too. Sometimes, though, it
feels like I'm flying by the seat of my pants and I have to re-focus.
I'm wondering about what to do with Abby, as far as reading
goes...she seems like she wants to read, but she hates it when I
try to instruct her. She gets upset and starts drifting. But, on her
own, she'll write down letters and ask me what they say. Her
favorite thing to write is "I love u". Any suggestions?
What type of doctor is your sis?

> By the way, any of you Floridians live near Tampa? I have a sister there
> who is a doctor. :)


Angela Nordstrom
Maya Wrap baby carriers
wrapyourbaby@...
